name: Dyslexia Experts
shortDescription: Specialized programs for dyslexic students of all ages
longDescription: We offer 1-on-1 sessions with certified dyslexia instructors using the Orton-Gillingham approach. Our multi-sensory techniques help students improve reading fluency, comprehension, and writing skills. We provide personalized learning plans and regular progress tracking.

name: ADHD Navigators
shortDescription: Behavioral therapy for ADHD kids and adults
longDescription: Our certified coaches use CBT techniques to improve focus, organization, and time management skills. We offer parent training programs and school advocacy services. Our evidence-based strategies help clients develop executive functioning skills for academic and life success.

name: Learning Solutions
longDescription: We help students overcome math anxiety and develop number sense through concrete-representational-abstract (CRA) methods. Our specialists create individualized programs targeting number concepts, arithmetic, and problem-solving skills using multisensory techniques.

name: Autism Spectrum Allies
longDescription: We provide ABA therapy, social skills training, and sensory integration therapy for children on the autism spectrum. Our team includes speech therapists, occupational therapists, and special educators working together to create holistic development plans.

name: Speech & Language Hub
longDescription: Our team assesses and treats articulation disorders, language delays, stuttering, and social communication challenges. We use play-based therapy for children and tailored approaches for adults, including accent modification and voice therapy programs.

name: Sensory Integration Center
longDescription: We help children with sensory processing disorders through individualized OT programs. Our clinic features sensory gyms with swings, climbing walls, and tactile stations. We focus on improving fine motor skills, self-regulation, and daily living activities.

name: Neurodiversity Consultants
longDescription: We provide career coaching, social skills training, and executive function support for adults with ADHD, autism, and other neurodiverse conditions. Our services include workplace accommodations guidance, time management systems, and relationship-building strategies.

name: Inclusive Education Partners
longDescription: We help families navigate IEP/504 plans, school placements, and learning accommodations. Our team includes former special education teachers who provide teacher training, classroom observations, and recommendations for curriculum modifications to support diverse learners.
